title: Antigravity vs Sora 2: Which AI Tool is Better in 2026?
metaDescription: Compare Antigravity vs Sora 2. See pricing, features, pros & cons to choose the best AI tool for your needs in 2026.
introduction: Choosing between Antigravity and Sora 2? These AI tools serve different but sometimes overlapping purposes, each with unique strengths. This comparison breaks down the key differences to help you decide.

sections.title: Overview: Antigravity vs Sora 2
paragraphs: Antigravity (developer tools) is Antigravity is a revolutionary multi-agent AI code editor that debuted at #1 in December 2026 developer rankings. Completely free during preview, it features unique multi-agent orchestration where multiple AI agents collaborate on complex coding tasks, integrated Chrome browser automation for testing, and support for the latest models (Gemini 3 Pro, Claude Sonnet 4.5/Opus 4.5). Its key differentiator is multi-agent collaboration—a capability no competitor offers—enabling it to tackle complex projects autonomously.. It's known for code-editor, ai-agents, multi-agent.

Sora 2 (generative ai) is Sora 2 is OpenAI's latest text-to-video generation model that creates high-quality, realistic videos up to 20 seconds long from text prompts or images. Released in September 2026, it features synchronized dialogue, ambient sound effects, and background music generated natively alongside video. Its key differentiator is the ability to generate cinematic, physically accurate videos with native audio in multiple styles including realistic, anime, and stylized formats.. Users choose it for video-generation, text-to-video, ai-video.

sections.title: Key Features
paragraphs: Antigravity: Multi-agent orchestration (unique feature), Integrated Chrome browser automation, Live preview and design-to-code
Sora 2: Text-to-video generation up to 20 seconds, Image-to-video with motion control, Native audio generation (dialogue, sound effects, music)

verdict: Both Antigravity and Sora 2 are excellent AI tools. Your choice depends on specific needs: Antigravity for code-editor, Sora 2 for video-generation.
